resources.string: PASCAL National College (PNC) is the best BCA college in Kathmandu Valley established to meet the global challenge of 21st-century cutting-edge education and research trends. Pascal National College is recognized as TU affiliated Best BCA college in Nepal as Our team of experienced academicians, IT professionals, and education experts are committed to providing students with a comprehensive education that prepares them to thrive in the competitive global market of Information Technology.
